snippet: The Russian Orthodox Church has denied supporting separatist turmoil in Ukraine, but after rebels seized Slovyansk, evidence accumulated of close ties between the church and the pro-Russian cause.
abstract: Russian Orthodox Church denies supporting separatist turmoil in Ukraine, but evidence grows of clergy's aiding pro-Russian rebels; Victor Butko, editor of small Ukrainian newspaper in Slovyansk shut down by rebels, witnessed priests blessing rebel fighters and letting them store ammunition on church grounds.
lead_paragraph: The Russian Orthodox Church has denied supporting separatist turmoil in Ukraine, but after rebels seized Slovyansk, evidence accumulated of close ties between the church and the pro-Russian cause.

headline.main: Evidence Grows of Russian Orthodox Clergy’s Aiding Ukraine Rebels
headline.print_headline: Evidence Grows of Russian Orthodox Clergy’s Aiding Ukraine Rebels
